original_text: Promise that you will not hurt us. We did not hurt you. We did only good things for you. We sent you away as friends. Now the Lord is blessing you.’
korean_text: 너는 우리를 해하지 말라 이는 우리가 너를 범하지 아니하고 선한 일만 네게 행하여 네가 평안히 가게 하였음이니라 이제 너는 여호와께 복을 받은 자니라

sentences.original_text: Promise that you will not hurt us.
We did only good things for you.
We sent you away as friends.
Now the Lord is blessing you.
